the original resident evil 4 is one of my alltime favorite video games its one of the best in the franchise and it still holds up well today especially with the hd project installed if i wanted to introduce someone to resident evil i would recommend they play this game if you havent played this masterpiece yet do so now
wait a minute this is resident evil  leon kennedy
resident evil 4 2005 is the goat of the resident evil series without a doubt  1010
one of the greatest games of all time and my personal favorite

this is still the best game in the series it steers away from the mazelike buildings and streets of prior games and replaces it with a much more linear progression you still get to solve puzzles and find secrets but the game focuses more on action than earlier resident evils games you also spend a good chunk of the game escorting ashley shes not a problem you can hide her in a box and the game takes her away several times i found this game to be a lot of fun to play through

the original re4 the control system definitely feels quite antiquated after 20 years of advancement but the game is designed around it so it doesnt get in the way as badly as youd expect  the setting is great and theres an engaging mix of actionhorror with exciting setpieces and some more tense spooky segments theres some lulls in the pacing and some padding here and there but overall its a classic experience thats more than worth playing
og re4 is way better than the remake
